item.title: About
item.description: I am a final year engineering student at Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani (BITS-Pilani) located in the beautiful state of Goa in India. I will graduate in 2019 with a B.E. (Hons.) in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering. I am currently at the University of New South Wales, Sydney, pursuing an undergraduate thesis under the supervision of Dr. Salil Kanhere and Dr. Sarang C. Dhongdi. Together with Ali Dorri and team, I am working on securing the Internet of Things using an optimized blockchain.
